Picasso swept everything in his path. Insatiable, he absorbed movements with the appetite of an ogre. He went through the 14-18 and 39-45 wars without losing his creative ardor and like the great wars, left behind him a scorched earth. 
Picasso a tout balay√© sur son passage. Insatiable, il absorbait les mouvements avec l‚Äôapp√©tit d‚Äôun ogre. Il a travers√© la guerre 14-18 et 39-45 sans perdre sa fougue cr√©ative et a comme les grandes guerres,  laiss√© derri√®re lui une terre br√ªl√©e.

Pierre Soulages left us at the age of 102.
I had made in 2020 a painting where the black was honored and not only the color. I had to integrate a back of book on Pierre Soulages. I am re-sharing it today to pay tribute to this remarkable artist who led an uncompromising career.
Vanitas 20.10.16
2020
Acrylic on canvas
152 x 111 cm
Private collectionüî¥ 
Pierre Soulages nous a quitt√© √† l‚Äô√¢ge de 102 ans.
J‚Äôavais r√©alis√©  en 2020 un tableau o√π le noir √©tait √† l‚Äôhonneur et pas seulement la couleur. Je me devais d‚Äôint√©grer un dos de livre sur Pierre Soulages. Je le re-partage aujourd‚Äôhui pour rendre hommage √† cet artiste remarquable qui a men√© une carri√®re sans compromis.

The wonders of street trash. I often fall on these beautiful forgotten objects that seem to deploy like trees from dust.

An old Jane Austen Book, that seemed to have been thrown out hundred of years ago by some snobbish french intellectual wondering in the slums of Montmartre. 

I didn't dare touch it to figure which novel it was, its natural position was so perfect! I couldn't read the page either, pressed by some honking driver. 

#trash #bookstagram #book #burnedbook #gutter #streettrash #trashart #janeausten #janeaustenfan
